title: Bloomberg Markets: Alphabet Sales Fall Short of Forecasts
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Alphabet Sales Fall Short of Forecasts
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jitendra Waral Senior Analyst: Internet & Consumer Electronics Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing Alphabet Inc. reported second-quarter revenue that met analysts’ projections, falling short of the most-optimistic estimates, and said the cost of its Google ads declined.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
